00025 using namespace std;
00026 
00027 /* See Cpp_Jni.cpp */
00028 extern bool createBasicDemo(void);
00029 extern bool deleteBasicDemo(void);
00030 
00031  
00032 
00033 /*
00034  * Standard GNU shared library entry interface
00035  * called before the main() in the program that loaded us
00036  */
00037 void __attribute__ ((constructor)) init_lib(void)
00038 {
00039     DEBUGSTR("Cpp_Jni DllMain(): constructor");
00040 
00041 
00042     if (!createBasicDemo())
00043     {
00044         cout<<"ERROR! Can't create Basic Demo Java interface!"<<endl;
00045         exit(-1);
00046     }
00047 }
00048 
00049 
00050 /*
00051  * Standard GNU shared library exit interface
00052  * called when main() program (that loaded us) exits.
00053  */
00054 void __attribute__ ((destructor)) close_lib(void)
00055 {
00056     DEBUGSTR("Cpp_Jni DllMain(): destructor");
00057 
00058     if (!deleteBasicDemo())
00059     {
00060         cout<<"ERROR! Can't delete Basic Demo Java interface!"<<endl;
00061         exit(-1);
00062     }
00063 
00064 }
